name: Fency Krabby
description:
Discover the fancy world of Fency Krabby! 

As a Gentelkrab, you have but one duty, smash your opponents to bits and become the Krab Champion...all the while not spoiling your magnificent attire too much. 

Strike, dash and guard, use every tool at your disposal to turn your opponents into nothing more than crab sticks! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  

                                                                 How to Play

Up to 4 Gentlekrabs can brawl together in this fun local fighting-game! 

Move with your left joystick, but keep in mind Crabs can't turn by themselves, they'll need outside assistance for that...

Then, use the turtles to turn around! Press A to climb upon one, and release it while inputting the direction of your choice to change directions! 

Is another crab in your line of sight? Strike him down! Use the Right Bumper to punch with your claw! 

Oh, feeling in danger? How about trying to Guard?  Press the Left Trigger!

How to deal with an opponent's Guard, you ask? Just Dash into it, it'll instantly shatter! Use the Left Bumper to Dash!  

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                    The Gentlemen behind Fency Krabby!

Producer: Clément Thiou

Lead Game Designer: Séléna Pavarino

Game Designer: Amorim Rodrigues Christophe

Game Designer: Aurélien Fontaine - Poulain de Saint Père

Lead Programmer: Camille Lavarde

Programmer: Elise Nguyen 

Game Artist: Manasseh Rakotoasimbola
